member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception
member.summary: Throws an exception for a Win32 error code.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the last Win32 error that occurred.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error.
member.param: The Win32 error code associated with this exception.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error and the specified detailed description.
member.param: The Win32 error code associated with this exception.
A detailed description of the error.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified context and the serialization information.
member.param: A that represents the context of this exception.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified detailed description.
member.param: A detailed description of the error.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified detailed description and the specified exception.
member.param: A detailed description of the error.
A reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Sets the object with the file name and line number at which this occurred.
member.param: The contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception.NativeErrorCode
member.summary: Gets the Win32 error code associated with this exception.
member.returns: The Win32 error code associated with this exception.
